Description: The Federal Trade Commission reached a settlement requiring Nivea skin cream maker Beiersdorf, Inc. to stop claiming that regular use of its Nivea My Silhouette skin cream can significantly reduce consumers' body size. The company also agreed to pay $900,000 as part of the settlement.
